item.title: Getting text from another file
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hey, can some one make a mini tut how i can for example create a new file (cooking.java) and then i use the command ::test03 it will show a message from “Cooking.java”.

client.java

if (command.startsWith("test03"))
{
}

[code]public class Cooking {
public Client c; // Player

	public void Cooking(Client c)
	{
	this.c = c;
	c.sM("This is a test");
	}

}[/code]

How can i get the command to send the message from cooking.java?

Read full topic
